full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/1/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Mother Immigration and Naturalization Service 9/18/1903 Form approved OMB No. 43-R423 AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT (ANSWER ALL ITEMS; FILL IN WITH TYPEWRITER OR PRINT IN BLOCK LETTERS IN INK.) VENKETACHALAM PARAMESWARAN 141 BRADLEY ROAD I, , residing at (Name) (Street and number) SCARSDALE NEW YORK 10583 U.S.A. (City) (State) (ZIP Code, if in U.S.) (Country) being duly sworn depose and say: 1. I was born on 6/23/1930 at QUILANDY (INDIA) Also, answer either a, b or c, as appro- (Date) (City) (Country) priate, if you are not a native born United States citizen. (a) If a United States citizen through naturalization, give number of certificate of naturalization (b) If a United States citizen through parent(s) or marriage, give number of own certificate of citizenship If none obtained, attach statement explaining how citizenship derived. (c) If an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence, give 'A' number 2. That I am 45 years of age and have resided in the United States since August 9, 1954 3. That this affidavit is executed in behalf of the following person(s) at present residing at 141 BRADLEY ROAD, SCARSDALE, Westehester County, New York 10583 : NAME SEX AGE COUNTRY OF BIRTH MARRIED OR RELATIONSHIP TO SINGLE DEPONENT P.R.V.Iyer M 83 INDIA Married Father JANAKI V. Iyer Fi 71 INDIA Married Mother 4. (Amounts shown in answer to this question must be in United States dollars.) (a) That I am employed as, or engaged in the business of INSURANCE with NEWYORK LIFE INS. CO. (Nam of concern) 'MadisonAve. N.Y. 16,800 plus commissions ($10,000) at and derive a net annual income of $ (b) That I have on deposit, in savings I also work as (Address) a Night Legal Annual Secretary Salary $12, with L28, Cravath. 00 plus Swaine $3,000 & Moore overtime 1, Chase approximately Manhattan Plaza banks in this country $ (c) That have other personal property, the reasonable value of which is $20,000 (d) That I have stocks and bonds in the amount of $ , market value, as indicated on attached list which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. (e) That I own real estate at 141BRADLEY RD, SCARSDALE valued at $75,000 , with mortgages or other encumbrances there- on amounting to $ 27,800 (f) That I have life insurance in the sum of $135,000 , cash surrender value of $ (g) That if self-employed, I attach a copy of my last income tax return or report of commer- cial rating concern which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. (See reverse, side for nature of evidence of net worth to be submitted) My wife, Dr. Priscilla Parameswaran is with IBM Corporate Headquarters at an annual salary of $20,000 plus frinje benefits. 5. That the following persons are dependent upon me for support: (Place a check in the appropriate column to indicate whether the person named is wholly or partially dependent upon you for support.) WHOLLY PARTIALLY NAME OF PERSON AGE RELATIONSHIP TO ME DEPENDENT DEPENDENT P. R V. HER FATHER JANAKI V IYER MOTHER DOISCILLA PARAMESWARAN 37 WIFE FOIA (b)( V. PARAMESWARAN to SELI Form 1-134 (Rev. 5-3,1-72) N As explained about, even Though my wife & fou are my legal dependents, mywife is earning $20,000 for year from IBM.
